item.title: Kapolri tunjuk Brigjen Desy Andriani sebagai Dirtipid PPA dan PPO
item.description: Kapolri tunjuk Brigjen Desy Andriani sebagai Dirtipid PPA dan PPO Arsip foto - Kapolri Jenderal Pol Listyo Sigit Prabowo. ANTARA FOTO/Asprilla Dwi Adha/rwa/pri. Mutasi dan rotasi adalah proses alamiah dalam organisasi dalam rangka meningkatkan kinerja, tour of duty area. Jakarta (ANTARA) - Kapolri Jenderal Pol. Listyo Sigit Prabowo menunjuk Brigjen Pol. Desy Andriani sebagai Direktur Tindak Pidana Perempuan dan Anak (PPA) dan Pidana Perdagangan Orang (PPO) Bareskrim Polri. Sebelumnya, Brigjen Pol.

item.title: What is the Rule of Law
item.description: In 1945, the United Nations was created on three pillars: international peace and security, human rights and development. Almost seventy-five years later, the complex political, social and economic transformation of modern society has brought us challenges and opportunities which require a collective response which must be guided by the rule of law, as it is the foundation of friendly and equitable relations between states and the base of fairs societies.
